All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AboutController
 
Admin
Class to store our Admin data
AdminController
 
AdminHolder
Singleton class of Admin, so that our admin can easily be recovered at any point in our program
AdminViewController
 
AppointmentDetailsController
Class to handle the GUI, to show the user the details of his selected appointment
AppointmentMail
Test Class to check the mail functions
AppointmentViewController
Class that handles the GUI for the AppointmentView.
DBConnection
Class to connect to MYSQL Database as well as close it DB connection achieved with JDBC driver DB: MYSQL, local host
Doctor
Class to hold the data of our doctor
DoctorHolder
Singleton class of user, so that our user can easily be recovered at any point in our program
DocType
Enum for the docType but never used
driver
Class can be used to check if the database connection works
EncryptionTestClass
Test Class to check if the encryption method works like intended
Gender
Gender ones was intended to implement but never used
GeocodeCoordinates
Class that holds the necessary GeocodeCoordinates latitude and longitude of the "normal" (entered by user) address as floats to be used for radius search etc.
HashClass
Class is used to hold encryption functions.
HealthInformation
Class to hold the health info after they get queried from the DB for easier use
HealthInformationController
Class controls GUI of health information The user can set his information with the given fxml textFields and can select the path, where the created pdf of his information will be saved.
HelloApplication
Start class.
HelloController
Class allows for login of user and redirecting to either mainpage, admin view or registration DB connection achieved with JDBC driver DB: MYSQL, localhost
HTTPconnection
 
Insurance
Never used
Login
Never used due to other solution for this problem.
MailUtil
Class is used to send Mails by authentic the mail with the given password.
MainPageApplication
Test class to start the MainPage without registration
MainPageController
Class to control the elements for the main page.
MakeAppointmentController
Class to handle GUI, to make an appointment.
RegistrationController
Class allows for first time registration of a user (as well as checking user is not registering double using email), user inputs information and it is inserted into DB Geocoding data (longitude and latitude) are also extracted using user input and saved in DB DB connection achieved with JDBC driver DB: MYSQL, localhost on each pc After registration immediate return to login page for login
Reminder
Class that stores our reminder configuration in the program for easy use after querying it out of the database
SceneController
Class allows to control scene switches easy from other controller.
Scheduler
Class used to create a job using Quartz to send an email at a specific time by creating a trigger that executes a job at a specific time.
SchedulerJob
Reminder Job implements the Job class of Quartz and executes the sending of an email, by calling a method of the MailUtility class.
TestUser
Class to hold TestUSer Information: same as user
UpdateAppointmentController
Class that handles the GUI, to update the selected time of an appointment.
User
class that holds our Userdata and has basic functionality for user management, like registering, updating a User
UserHolder
Singleton class of user, so that our user can easily be recovered at any point in our program
UserProfileController
Class to control the GUI of the users profile view with the fxml elements and a SceneController object.
UserProfileEditController
Class handles the GUI of the edit user Scene and provides functions to edit the user in the database.
